1.0.name: wordpress/netglobers-widget
1.0.description:
Enrich and add content your blog with the latest trendy widget ! All your trips in a smart widget to share your travel tips with the world.

Make your blog stand out from all other blogs with this 3D animated globe ! Fully customizable widget to enhance your blog design.

This widget is brought to you by NetGlobers, Europ Assistance. More information available on http://www.netglobers.com

You need to create an account on http://www.netglobers.com so as to be able to use this widget.
